name: Global Egging
description:
A game inspired by the Egg Smash Challenge, with a nature vs pollution theme.

Key Features:

  • Fun local multiplayer;
  • Only one key for each player;
  • You don't have to waste eggs!

Controls:

  • Smack the cup 
    • Player 1 - Z
    • Player 2 - M
  • Lift the cup
    • Player 1 - ZZ
    • Player 2 - MM
  • Hit the table (when the cup is lifted)
    • Don't press anything
